channel.description: The C.O.W.S. Radio Program is specifically engineered for black & non-white listeners - Victims of White Supremacy. The purpose of this program is to provide Victims of White Supremacy with constructive information and suggestions on how to counter Racist Woman & Racist Man. Gus T Renegade completed 217 programs without owning a phone or a computer. COMPENSATORY SEX PLEDGE: I DO NOT CONDONE, ENCOURAGE OR PARTICIPATE IN SEXUAL INTERCOURSE BETWEEN WHITE PEOPLE AND NON-WHITE PEOPLE. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Dr. Frances Cress Welsing Part XVI
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Dr. Frances Cress Welsing makes her sixteenth visit to The Context of White Supremacy. We're eager to here Dr. Welsing's thoughts on how 2012 is unfolding on the plantation. When Gus last spoke with Dr. Welsing, she emphasized the importance of the recent reports on the dropping birth rates of White people in the US. Dr. Welsing theorized that this may increase anxiety amongst the minority White population - motivating them to increase their Terroristic behaviors against non-white people. We'll ask her to detail any correlations between recent Racist activities and the 2012 presidential election. We're also anxious to hear her detail how it benefits dark people to have another four years of Pres. Obama. item.title: The C.O.W.S. YURUGU Study Session (Pages 151 -210)
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The Context of White Supremacy hosts the weekly study session on Dr. Marimba Ani's Yurugu: An African-Centered Critique of European Cultural Thought and Behavior. We'll continue our analysis of Chapter Two, Religion and Ideology. We emphasize Dr. Ani's assessment of how White people have bludgeoned non-white people with their White Supremacist religious concepts and symbols. We'll pay particular attention to the misogynistic tendencies that are rife within White religion. We'll also emphasize that the Crusades and missionary campaigns should be understood as necessary, acts of Terrorism. item.title: The C.O.W.S. Racism and the NBA
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Dr. David J. Leonard visits The Context of White Supremacy. Dr. Leonard is an Associate Professor in the Department of Critical Culture, Gender and Race Studies at Washington State University. Dr. Leonard is a White man with a B.A. in Black studies from the University of California, Santa Barbara, and a master's and Ph.D. from the University of California, Berkeley. Dr. Leonard investigates popular culture as both a space of violence/White Supremacist affirmation and opposition. We'll discuss his 2012 publication, After Artest: Race and the War on Hoop. No disrespect of Kobe Bryant, LeBron James or Michael Jordan, but White people rule the hardwood too. item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Dr. Kamau Kambon makes his fifth visit to The Context of White Supremacy [http://kamaukambon.org]. We'll ask Dr. Kambon to share his thoughts on the recent passing of Steve Coakley. Dr. Kambon will help explain the magnitude of this loss. We'll also ask Dr. Kambon to explain simple things that black people can to eliminate White Terror Domination/White Supremacy - like writing a letter or a post card. As always we hope his visit will help us to remain focused, SERIOUS. item.title: The C.O.W.S. YURUGU Study Session (Pages 100 -150)
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The Context of White Supremacy hosts the weekly study session on Dr. Marimba Ani's YURUGU: An African-Centered Critique of European Cultural Thought and Behavior. Pages 100 to 150 encompass most of Chapter 2, Religion and Ideology. Dr. Ani provide a surgical dissection of how White people have used the religion of White Supremacy as a weapon of mass destruction against non-white people world wide. Dr. Ani quotes Ayi Kwei Armah: " There was a third white destroyer: a missionary who wanted to replace all knowledge of our way with fables..." White fables have wreaked ongoing, monumental damage. item.title: The C.O.W.S. Racist Cake in Sweden?
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Makode Linde visits The Context of White Supremacy live from Sweden. We look forward to hearing his views on the System of White Supremacy/Racism. Mr. Linde is an Afro-Swedish artist who has created an array of fascinating work that seems to focus on Racism. We'll get his views on the fury that his cake caused earlier this year. Linde created a cake in the image of an black female - reportedly to bring attention to female genital mutilation in Africa. Many around the world felt the work was Racist. We'll get his take. [The C.O.W.S. archives: http://tiny.cc/76f6p] CALL IN NUMBER: 760.569.7676 CODE 564943# SKYPE: FREECONFERENCECALLHD.7676 CODE 564943# Invest in The COWS - http://tiny.cc/ledjb

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Joris de Bres (New Zealand)
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The Context of White Supremacy welcomes Joris de Bres live from New Zealand. Mr. de Bres has been New ZealandÃ¢??s Race Relations Commissioner since 2002. His main focus is to encourage central and local government, business and community organisations to develop their own diversity programmes and projects and to come together in the New Zealand Diversity Action Programme. As Mr. de Bres is our first guest from the area of the world known as New Zealand, we're excited to hear how Racism operates on this side of the planet/plantation. We'll ask Mr. de Bres what obstacles he's encountered from White people - it seems that around the world, Racists suggest that non-white people are also Racist. item.description: The Context of White Supremacy hosts the weekly Compensatory Call-In. We invite non-white listeners to call in to share codified concepts, observations, research findings and/or problem solving techniques. item.description: Grand Wizard Gos visits The Context of White Supremacy live from the UK. Gos recently published his first book, Making Malone Volume 1. This collection of essays offers his views on the System of White Supremacy and how black people are dehumanized, obstructed in all areas of life. item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Jim Forrest (Australia)
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Jim Forrest visits The Context of White Supremacy live from Sydney, Australia. Mr. Forrest is an Associate Professor in the Department of Environment and Geography at Macquarie University. Mr. Forrest's research interests are mainly "in the social and electoral areas, focusing on geographies of advantage and disadvantage, most recently on ethnic group disadvantage. This area of work is currently being extended into research into geographies of racism." When asked about White people and Racism Australia, Forrest stated: "About one in eight is avowedly racist. This compares with one in three in western Europe and one in five in the US." We'll ask him how he came to this conclusion and more. [The C.O.W.S. archives: http://tiny.cc/76f6p] CALL IN NUMBER: 760.569.7676 CODE 564943# SKYPE: FREECONFERENCECALLHD.7676 CODE 564943# Invest in The COWS - http://tiny.cc/ledjb

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Black Health & The Black Panther Party
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Dr. Alondra Nelson visits The Context of White Supremacy. Dr. Nelson teaches sociology and gender studies at Columbia University and was previously on the faculty of Yale University. An interdisciplinary social scientist, Alondra writes about the intersections of science, technology, medicine and inequality (White Supremacy). We'll discuss her most recent publication, Body and Soul: The Black Panther Party and the Fight Against Medical Discrimination. Her standout work documents the Black Panther Party's monumental efforts to improve the mental and physical health of black people. Dr. Nelson emphasizes that many of the Panthers idealogical influences were physicians - Frantz Fanon, Che Guevara - Dr. Frances Cress Welsing is a third generation physician as well. item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Donalea Scott (UK)
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Ms. Donalea Scott visits The Context of White Supremacy live from the United Kingdom [http://getaperspective.blogspot.com]. We'll discuss her views on the degradation of black beauty and how this retards our ability to successfully counter-racism. item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Joseph Gibson returns to The Context of White Supremacy. item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The Context of White Supremacy welcomes Valerie Martin and Dr. Darron Smith. Martin is a former teacher and award-winning fiction writer. We'll dissect her 2003 publication, Property. Martin's novel examines the plantation from the perspective of Racist Woman; specifically, she explores Racist Woman's fury with regards to White Men's sexual obsession with black males, females and children. Gus suspects this is a key component of the insatiable appeal of Plantation Fiction. Martin will be followed by Dr. Darron Smith. Dr. Smith is an assistant professor in the Department of Physician Studies at Wichita State. Dr. Smith was gracious enough to speak candidly about his marriage to a Racist female; the White woman now refuses to communicate with him and has become a major obstacle between he and his two children. We'll discuss Dr. Smith's upcoming book on Suspected White Supremacists adopting black children. We look forward to hearing Dr. Smith's thoughts on whether or not White "Ignorance" is producing White Supremacy/Racism. Gus is reminded of Dr. Jared Ball's visit to The C.O.W.S.. item.title: The C.O.W.S. The Showman & The Slave
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Dr. Benjamin Reiss visits The Context of White Supremacy. Dr. Reiss specializes in 19th-century American literature and culture, with strong interests in the history of medicine, race, disability, popular culture, and environmental issues. We'll discuss his 2001 publication, The Showman and the Slave: Race, Death, and Memory in Barnum's America. Dr. Reiss examines one of the most popular figures of the 1800's P. T. Barnum. Barnum heavily influenced the White Supremacist minstrel shows which exploded in the 19th century. We'll discuss Barnum's exploitation of Joice Heth, a black female/slave. We'll explore the chronic, Racist necrophilia of White people; Barnum charged admission to see the autopsy/mutilation of Heth's corpse. We'll also not the similar debasement of Sarah "Saartjie" Baartman, Sojourner Truth, Michelle Obama and Halle Berry. item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Bruce Baum visits The Context Of White Supremacy. Professor Baum holds a doctorate from the University of Minnesota and is an Associate Professor in the department of political science at the University of British Columbia. We'll discuss some of his more recent writings that address Racism/White Supremacy. Professor Baum co-edited the 2009 publication. Racially Writing the Republic: Racists, Race Rebels, and Transformations of American Identity. Duchess Harris & Professor Baum contributed the provocative essay, Jefferson's Legacies: Racial Intimacies and American Identity. They investigate sexual relationships between black people and some of the more notorious White Supremacists in the US - Thomas Jefferson and Strom Thermond. We'll also explore Baum's 2006 offering, The Rise and Fall of The Caucasian Race. item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: David Livingston Smith visits The Context of White Supremacy. Dr. Smith holds a Ph.D. in philosophy from the University of London (Kings College), and is currently an associate professor in the department of philosophy and religious studies at the University of New England in Maine. We'll discuss his 2011 publication, Less Than Human: Why We Demean, Enslave, And Exterminate Others. Dr. Smith investigates the concept of dehumanization and why the idea is integral to any form of human abuse/WHITE SUPREMACY. Although there is much evidence that White and non-white people are capable of - and often do - treat others as less than human; NO ONE holds a candle to White people. Gus asserts that the dehumanization of black people is one of the primary activities of White people world wide; Mark Twain, Planet Of The Apes, King Kong, Training Day, Hurricane Katrina, The UK Riots, Precious... item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Dr. Jane H. Hill visits The Context of White Supremacy. Dr. Hill is Regents' Professor of Anthropology and Linguistics at the University of Arizona. She has done extensive research on the relationship between language and White Supremacy. Her 2008 publication, The Everyday Language of White Racism, examines how words are used to advance, conceal and excuse the ongoing interprise of White Terrorism. We'll discuss how White Supremacist commentary is frequently masqueraded as "a joke" - and how the practice of coding White Supremacy in jokes is extremely effective for perpetuating the system. We'll also discuss the concept of "Mock Spanish". The purposeful, "playful" degradation of the Spanish language, subtly encourages the abuse of non-white people. When questioned about vanilla not being White, Dr. Rasayon produced a classic retort: "Neither are 'White' people." We'll focus this broadcast the bio-chemical attack against "Melanin Dominant Hue-mans". Dr. Rasayon's Reality Check: A Manual For The Hue-man Octahedron & The Mystery of Melanin, offers an indepth analysis of why darker people display a greater connection with The Creater, the universe and other forms of life. His books asserts that White people (Melanin Recessive Hue-mans), maintain a constant electro-bio-chemical assault against us. item.description: Cameron McWhirter visits The Context of White Supremacy [http://cameronmcwhirter.com]. Watson Fellowship for research in Eritrea and the Sudan. We'll discuss his 2011 publication, RED SUMMER: The Summer Of 1919 And The Awakening Of Black America. McWhirter documents the raging White Terrorism that engulfed the entire country. White Supremacist mobs instigated violent clashes in Washington DC, Chicago, Omaha, Knoxville and many other cities. We'll discuss how black people responded to this crisis and note similarities to our current climate of economic distress and social unrest. item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ BLACK RAGE IN NEW ORLEANS
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Dr. Leonard Moore visits The Context of White Supremacy. Dr. Moore is a professor at the University of Texas (Austin) and Associate Vice President in the Division of Diversity and Community Engagement. We'll discuss his 2010 publication, Black Rage In New Orleans: Police Brutality and African American Activism from World War II to Hurricane Katrina. Dr. Moore documents the long running abuse of black New Orleans residents. We'll recognize the life and death of Mark James Robert Essex. Mr. Essex launched a one man counter assault on the New Orleans Police Department which left 9 people dead - 5 enforcement officers - and 13 wounded. We'll also explore how police barbarism against blacks has continued even when the officers are black. And of course... Hurricane Katrina and the White Vigilante Terrorism that followed. item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Northwestern University Kirkland & Ellis Professor of Law, Dorothy E. Roberts makes her third visit to The Context of White Supremacy. Professor Roberts authored Killing the Black Body: Race, Reproduction, and The Meaning of Liberty (1997) & Shattered Bonds: The Color of Child Welfare (2004). We'll examine her exemplary new publication, Fatal Invention: How Science, Politics, and Big Business Re-create Race in the Twenty-first Century (2011). Professor Roberts asserts that the concept of Race is frequently disguised as a biological certainty. Nothing could be further from the truth. We'll discuss how the Human Genome Project, and ethno-specific medicine continues the long tradition of reifying the false concept of Race. RACE = RACISM = WHITE SUPREMACY. item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The Context of White Supremacy welcomes Dr. Teun A. van Dijk live from Barcelona Spain. Professor van Dijk is former chair of Discourse Studies at the University of Amsterdam. He is currently a visiting professor at the Universitat Pompeu Fabra, Barcelona. He's published a litany of material on White Supremacy/Racism as a system and ways of combating that System. We look forward to discussing his 1987 publication Communicating Racism. Dr. van Dijk deconstructs how White people use words to convey, defend and mask their White Supremacist attitudes. We'll also explore the rise in explicit White Supremacist behavior that is spearing throughout the area of the world known as Europe; is this happening in Spain as well? It controls your thoughts, beliefs, actions, how you live your life, your self confidence, your family, your children, your future... humanity's future... The white chip.. the single most powerful brainwashing agent of the world's people by advocacy of white supremacy. We are empowered to deactivate the white chip. And we will find the truth. item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ DEATH OF BLACK AMERICA
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Eran Reya visits The Context of White Supremacy. Mr. Reya has written short stories and screenplays and authored the 2007 publication, THE DEATH OF BLACK AMERICA. This book offers a warning to black people in the United States. White Supremacy has wreaked havoc on us for centuries. item.title: CREE w/ Paul Ifayomi Grant-- London is Burning
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Paul Ifayomi Grant, a black/Afrikan male author who resides in the part of the world known as London, England, stops by the CREE workshop. We will discuss the background and consequences of last weekend's "rioting" by black people in that part of the world following the shooting by enforcement officials of 29 year-old father of four, Mark Duggan. Mr. Grant is a well known writer, management consultant and public speaker. He has authored six books including, Saving Our Sons. His books and other media are available at his website, www.houseofknowledge.org.uk , as well as at other black bookstores on both sides of "the pond." We'll ask Mr. Grant about any thoughts he has on the united-independent Abstain Until campaign to completely end the lynching of black people across the globe by enforcement officials. Phone in with your questions by dialing (347) 633-9734.

item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Context of White Supremacy will have a codification study session. item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Dr. Barbara Trepagnier
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
Admitted Racist, Dr. Barbara Trepagnier visits The Context of White Supremacy. We'll discuss her most interesting publication, Silent Racism: How Well-Meaning White People Perpetuate The Racial Divide. A codified interpretation of a profound portion of her book:
The existence of the "not racist" category produces in the mind of the [non-white person] the illusion that [there are White people who] bear no responsibility for [The System of White Supremacy]. Yet, [White Supremacy] cannot be isolated from the [White Supremacist] practice and everyday [White Supremacy] of White people who produce indirect [Systemic White Supremacy] daily, regardless of their recognition of it or their intention to do so. in this way, the illusion that most White people are "not racist" virtually ensures the perpetuation of [the System of White Supremacy]. Although [Refined White Supremacy] by definition is not spoken aloud, it would be a mistake to assume that it is of little importance or that the behavior following from it is not [White Supremacist]. Passivity by White people is also important in maintaining the [System of White Supremacy], allowing it to operate without interruption, but also encourages it. (pg. 82-83) [The C.O.W.S. archives: http://tiny.cc/76f6p] CALL IN NUMBER: 760.569.7676 CODE 564943# SKYPE: FREECONFERENCECALLHD.7676 CODE 564943# Invest in The COWS - http://tiny.cc/ledjb

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Dr. Joe R. Feagin - Mar 13,2010
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Texas A&M's Dr. Joe Feagin - an Admitted Racist - will share his views on the System of White Supremacy. Dr. Joe Feagin has authored a litany of texts on Racism/White Supremacy. We'll examine one of Dr. Feagin's treasures, Two-Faced Racism: Whites In The Backstage And Frontstage. This is one of the most constructive, informative books Gus has ever read. Dr. Feagin examines one of the core aspects of how White People practice Racism/White Supremacy: remaining hyper-vigilant to not appear Racist in front of non-white people. Two-Faced Racism exposes what White people speak about when no non-white people are present. Specifically, the book deconstructs the symbolism of Racist jokes, the sophisticated codes that White Supremacists produce and refine to speak about Racism and a multitude of testimonies that evidence that Racists assume that if you are White, you are Racist. item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
A panel of guests will share their views on how Racism/White Supremacy is manifested in cinema. Dr. Martin Kevorkian (Author of Color Monitors), Khalid Patterson & Frederick Gooding (Authors of You Mean, There's Race in My Movie?) will share their views on how non-whites are consistently degraded while the System of White Supremacy is glorified and promoted. We will examine recent films such as Collateral and Hancock; although both works feature non-white actors in leading roles, White Supremacy reigns - even in how these movies are marketed. We'll also explore Hollywood blockbusters like Borat and Rocky, which would suggest that Racism/White Supremacy is always a big hit with audiences. I'm certain we'll make a comment about how "interracial relationships" are presented on the silver screen.

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Dr. Mwalimu K. Baruti Part III - Jul 08,2010
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Dr. Mwalimu K. Baruti makes his third visit to The Context of White Supremacy. This time we are privileged to analyze his distinguished contribution, Complementarity: Thoughts for Afrikan Warrior Couples. Dr. Baruti offers a mature apprasial of the challenges black people face in selecting a life partner and attempting to construct a family within the confines of White Supremacy. Dr. Baruti writes: To be an adult without a complement is to survive. To be coupled with one's complement is to exist and thrive at full capacity. As the System of White Domination is diametrically opposed to black males and females achieving harmony with one another, it is imperative that black people develop the highest regard for trusting, healthful, constructive bonds between black males and females. We will request that Dr. Baruti share suggestion on how best to simultaneously nourish a long term relationship, minimize/defuse conflict and combat White Supremacy.

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Neely Fuller, Jr. Part XII
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
Any people who value survival more than justice, do not understand that survival, without justice, is valueless.
Any people who do not know the value of justice are an extremely ignorant people. This mostly pertains to Black and/or non-white people.
Neely Fuller, Jr. makes his 12th appearance on The C.O.W.S. . We'll discuss why black and non-white people should never attempt to prove that we are not inferior to White people. So called inferiority does not justify mistreatment. Mr. Fuller will also offer his thoughts on how the reported death of Osama bin Laden relates to his view of Global White Terrorism. {Click http://bit.ly/gILFDq to order his vital publications}.

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Dr. Kamau Kambon - Feb 22,2011
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The Context of White Supremacy recognizes its two year anniversary at blogtalkradio and welcomes Dr. Kamau Kambon. Dr. Kambon is a community parent, activist/organizer, educator and co-manager of BlackNificent Books and More and the Bennu Cultural Center with his wife, Mawiyah. He's authored a litany of books addressing White World Domination - Black Guerrilla Warfare in amerika, Tips on Quick and Easy Ways Afrikans Can Commit Subtle Suicide, You Should Be Ashamed of Your Nice, But Duped Parents. We'll study one of his earlier offerings, The Last Book. Dr. Kamau Kambon will elaborate on his contention that every White person is a carrier/component of the World System of White Domination. We'll also ask Dr. Kambon to stress the importance of CONTEXT.{Dr. Harry Davidson and Suspected White Supremacist, Steven Jacobson were guests on The C.O.W.S. in 2010.}

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Lena Hill
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The C.O.W.S. welcomes University of Iowa professor, Lena Hill. Professor Hill concentrates on 20th century African-American literature and Visial Media. She is currently working on a book that examines the role of visual art aesthetics in African-American literature from 1900 to 1952. She co-authored Ralph Ellison's Invisible Man: A Reference Guide and recently published "The Visual Art of Invisible Man: Ellison's Portrait of Blackness". We'll ask Professor Hill to offer her thoughts on Ralph Ellison extraordinary novel. We'll explore Ellison's portrayal of the sexual conflict between black males and White women and how White people keep their Victims chasing paper.

item.description: University of Texas' Dr. John Hoberman will share his views on the System of White Supremacy. Dr. Hoberman is the author of Darwin's Athletes : How sport has damaged Black America and preserved the myth of race. Dr. Hoberman's work explores how black people - especially black males - have been confined to & commodified as athletes and primitive physical specimens. He investigates how the accomplishments of black athletes are often exaggerated as triumphs over the System of White Supremacy and why black male athletes are perpetually dehumanized and domesticated - often at the same time(See below). item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ John Potash - Oct 04,2009
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
Author John Potash will share his views on the System of White Supremacy. John Potash wrote The FBI War on Tupac Shakur and Black Leaders. Potash places the life and murder of Tupac Shakur within the context of White Supremacy; specifically, he details how White Supremacist enforcement officials attacked Shakur's family and friends who worked against Racism prior to his birth. Potash provides a wealth of evidence to explain why powerful White people remained acutely vigilant of Shakur for the duration of his life. He explains why Suspected White Supremacists desired the assassination of Shakur and evidences how Suspected Racists coordinated his death. Potash will discuss how the abuses that Tupac Shakur suffered are trademark White Supremacist tactics that have been used against Martin Luther King, Jr, Malcolm X, Huey P. Newton, Ol' Dirty Bastard, Bob Marley, Fred Hampton, Patrice Lumumba and a litany of other non-white people who have - or might have - worked against the System of Racism. Listeners who are familiar with COINTELPRO, will have a greater appreciation for and understanding of this program (For those unfamiliar with COINTELPRO, please, check out Dr. Kenneth O'Reilly).
Invest in The COWS - http://tiny.cc/ledjb

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ Mrs. Doreen Lawrence - Feb 12,2011
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The Context of White Supremacy welcomes Mrs. Doreen Lawrence. Mrs. Lawrence is a black female who resides in the United Kingdom. She is the mother of Stephen Lawrence. Stephen Lawrence was stabbed to death by a gang of teenage Racists. Stephen Lawrence was eighteen at the time of his death. No one has ever been punished for his murder. We'll discuss her book, "And Still I Rise": Seeking Justice for Stephen - which offers a thorough account of her views and courage.The next thing I remember is a shout of 'F*$@ing nigger.' I was too upset to do anything about it, but my sisters and cousin walked over and confronted the [Racist Suspect] who had shouted, and were called 'Black c*$ts.' in return. Cheryl said, 'it was bastards like you that killed my nephew.' The [White Woman] then said, 'If he hadn't been in this country he'd still be alive.' She then grabbed a brick out of the boot of her car and threatened Cheryl with it. It was a terrible introduction to the outside world.(Days after the murder of Stephen Lawrence)

item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
On Saturday 16 April 2011, two student associations (Hallands and Helsingkrona), known as "Nations" in Lund University were involved in a controversial party showcasing a "slave auction". During the party organized by Hallands Nation, 3 people with blackened faces were reportedly tied up with ropes and led into the hall by a "slave owner." The "slaves" were "sold" off during the party.
Mr. Jallow Momodou visits The Context of White Supremacy. Mr. Momodou is a member of the National Afro-Swedish Association and a faculty member of Lund University. We'll discuss Mr. Momodou'explicit episodes of White Supremacy. He reported the above Racist incidents, and was subsequently subjected to additional Racist abuse. Following news of his complaint, Momodou arrived at his office at MalmÃ¶ University on Wednesday morning to find posters on the library bulletin board featuring his face superimposed on the image of a naked man in chains. â??Our negro slave has run away,â?? read the text on the posters. We look forward to hearing more about White Supremacy in the area of the world known as Sweden.

item.title: The C.O.W.S. w/ The Oreo Experience - Jan 27,2010
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
The Oreo Experience will share her views on the System of White Supremacy. The Oreo Experience is committed to sharing the witty insight and keen perspectives of a black person who is regarded as having adopted the attitudes, values, and behavior thought to be characteristic of middle-class white society, often at the expense of his or her own heritage. We will ask her if it would be accurate to categorize her efforts as a response to Racism/White Supremacy. The C.O.W.S. will enjoy it's first live musical performance as well as scintillating, informative dialog on The Blindside and "interracial relationships". {Our riveting discussion impacted The Oreo Experience so deeply she felt compelled to blog about her C.O.W.S. experience. Check it out!}

item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: The Admitted White Supremacist known as Tim Wise makes his second trip to The Context of White Supremacy. Mr. Wise reiterated that he practices Racism/White Supremacy and that he cannot imagine how a White person could avoid practicing Racism under the current System of Injustice. He also elaborated on his statement that aspects of Dr. Frances Cress Welsing's theory of White Genetic Annihilation are pseudo-scientific bullsh*t. Mr. Wise made a verbal agreement to make one appearance per month on The C.O.W.S. radio program until July 2010. He also committed to make his fourth trip to this program on Sunday, February 21st at 7:30PM Eastern/ 4:30PM Pacific.

item.description:
David Sheen visits The Context of White Supremacy. Mr. Sheen is an Admitted Racist, a journalist and documentarian who resides in Tel Aviv, Israel. Mr. Sheen will offer his thoughts on the Admitted White Supremacist known as Timothy Wise and what it means to be a White person. Mr. Sheen has recorded many White people speaking publicly against non-white people in Tel Aviv. We look forward to learning more about White Supremacy in the so-called Middle East. item.title: Ferrell Winfree & The System of White Supremacy
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
The admitted White Supremacist known as Ferrell Winfree will share her views on the System of White Supremacy. We will discuss how non-whites are conditioned to seek love and affection from White people, how non-whites & White people can establish Justice and what it means to be "White" in a System of White Supremacy. This show is designed for Victims of Racism. =========== Greetings,
The Admitted Racist known as Ferrell Winfree was a previous guest on The Context of White Supremacy Radio Show. Several listeners wrote in the chat room during and at the conclusion of the broadcast that Ms. Winfree was evasive in answering questions and spent most of the program saying things that were not relevant. The host is in agreement with this assessment.
As a student of Racism/White Supremacy, I have observed that White people excel in not answering questions posed by non-whites. I interviewed Ms. Winfree previously; she was direct, honest and I never had to repeat a question to get an answer. I was quite surprised that I had to ask her the same question on multiple occasions to get a response. I expected her to be as honest and direct as she was the first time.
HUGE ERROR. NEVER EXPECT HONESTY OR CANDOR FROM A WHITE PERSON. NEVER!
I was too accommodating of her evasiveness, and the show was adversely impacted as a result. She shared very little constructive information. It was not an economic investment of time and energy.
However, the listeners scrutiny was valuable. Ms. Winfree saw the comments in the chat room and requested an opportunity to respond. She will get her chance: Wednesday, April 1st. 9:00PM EASTERN TIME.
And I will remember my errors from this show. I will make an effort to call out and directly challenge any White person who is being evasive or not answering questions in a satisfactory manner. It is not constructive to give White people a plat form to be dishonest and create confusion among non-whites. If I am unable to speak with White people in such a way that they reveal truth and constructive information for Victims of White Supremacy, there is no need for me to do a show.
Make sure I am doing my job as a host of this show. If I am failing in my duties as host of this show, call me on it.
Be constructive and keep listening.
Gus T Renegade/ Victim of White Supremacy

item.title: EPISODE1 - The Atlanta Child Murders & Chet Dettlinger
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Author Chet Dettlinger will talk about his work with the so called "Atlanta Child Murders" - 29 murdered and missing black people during the early 1980's. Wayne Williams was ultimately convicted of 2 of the 29 victims, and the case was closed. No one was ever charged with the other 27 cases. Many felt that Racism strongly influenced this case. Mr Dettlinger will share his view on this forgotten tragedy.
